title: Mexican Bean Beetle
author: Clariss39
pages:
Mexican bean beetle
(Epilachna varivestis)

A species of
Coccinellidae, the same
family as ladybugs!

It is one of the few
North American lady
beetles that feed on
plants rather than
other insects.

Because of that it is
sometimes considered
an agricultural pest. :(

It is found throughout
Mexico and the
eastern United States.
